plays.text: Goal scored by Shaun Van Allen assisted by Martin Havlat and Chris Phillips
Penalty to Ken Daneyko 2 minutes for Broken Stick(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Radek Bonk assisted by Martin Havlat and Peter Schaefer
Penalty to Oleg Tverdovsky 2 minutes for Crosschecking Chris Neil
Penalty to Zdeno Chara 2 minutes for High Sticking Patrik Elias
Penalty to Magnus Arvedson 2 minutes for Holding Scott Gomez
Penalty to Daniel Alfredsson 2 minutes for Tripping Oleg Tverdovsky
Goal scored by Radek Bonk assisted by Jody Hull
